aboutText: I am Iftakher Hossen. I'm from Dhaka, Bangladesh. I'm doing a Diploma-in-Engineering in Computer Science. I am a dedicated and hardworking person. Learning something different is my habit. I am familiar with React, Node.js, Next.js, MongoDB, Material UI, Javascript, Data Structures, Bootstrap, Tailwind, Next.js, VS Code, Git. And learning more new technologies. I love to spend my time with my family.
